00021 namespace x2d {
00022 namespace liverpool {
00023 
00027         class entry 
00028     {
00029         public:
00030                 typedef enum 
00031         {
00032                         type_undef = 0,
00033                         type_dir,
00034                         type_file
00035                 } entry_type;
00036                 
00037         private:
00038                 entry_type   type_;         // Type - dir or file                       
00039                 unsigned int offset_;   // Offset starting from global data pointer                     
00040                 unsigned int size_;             // Size of file in bytes
00041                 unsigned int depth_;    // The depth of this item relative to the root ('/')
00042                 std::string  path_;                     
00043                 
00044         public:
00050                 entry(const std::string& path, int ofst, int sz)
00051                 : type_( *path.rbegin()=='/'? type_dir : type_file )
00052                 , offset_(ofst)
00053                 , size_(sz)  
00054                 , depth_(std::count(path.begin(), path.end(), '/')-(type_==type_dir?1:0))
00055                 , path_(path)
00056                 { 
00057                         // Add a front slash to the path (the root folder)
00058                         path_.insert(path_.begin(), '/');
00059                         
00060                         // Remove last slash in path for directories
00061                         if(type_ == type_dir) 
00062             {
00063                                 path_.erase(path_.rfind('/'));
00064                         }
00065                 };      
00066                 
00067                 inline const entry_type& type() const { return type_; };
00068                 inline bool is_dir() const { return type_ == type_dir; };
00069                 inline unsigned int offset() const { return offset_; };
00070                 inline unsigned int size() const { return size_; };
00071                 inline unsigned int depth() const { return depth_; };
00072                 inline const std::string path() const { return path_; };
00073         };      
00074         
00078         class liverpool {
00079         private:
00080                 typedef std::vector<entry>      entry_vec;
00081                 
00082                 entry_vec       entries_;                               
00083         ifdstream       fs_stream_;
00084                 
00085         void init();
00086         inline const ifdstream open_fs(const path& p);
00087         
00091                 unsigned int read_int(int bytes);
00092         
00093                 void read_local_file_header();
00094                 entry read_central_dir_record();
00095                 
00096         public:
00097                 
00101                 liverpool(const ifdstream& fds);
00102         
00106         liverpool(const path& p);
00107                 
00108                 ~liverpool() 
00109         {
00110                         if(fs_stream_.is_open()) 
00111             {
00112                                 fs_stream_.close();
00113                         }
00114                 }
00115                                 
00119                 template<int _OFFSET>
00120                 class filter : public std::unary_function<entry, bool> 
00121         {
00122                 private:
00123                         std::string& path_;
00124                         unsigned int depth_;
00125                         
00126                 public:
00130                         filter(std::string& path) 
00131                         : path_(path)
00132                         {
00133                                 // This is a directory?
00134                                 if(*path_.rbegin()=='/') 
00135                 {
00136                                         path_.erase(path_.rfind('/'));
00137                                 }
00138                                 
00139                                 depth_ = std::count(path_.begin(), path_.end(), '/')-_OFFSET;   
00140                         }
00141                         
00142                         bool operator ()(const entry& e) 
00143             {
00144                                 return e.depth() == depth_ && e.path().find(path_) == 0;
00145                         }
00146                 };
00147 
00148                 typedef filter<1> file_filter;
00149                 typedef filter<0> dir_filter;
00150                 
00154                 template<class _FT>
00155                 class basic_iterator 
00156         {
00157                 public:
00158                         basic_iterator(liverpool* l) 
00159                         : l_(l)
00160                         , path_("")     // Empty path - always nonexisting
00161                         , current_(l_->entries_.end())
00162                         { 
00163             }
00164 
00165                         basic_iterator(liverpool* l, std::string& path) 
00166                         : l_(l)
00167                         , path_(path)
00168                         , current_( std::find_if(l_->entries_.begin(), 
00169                                                                          l_->entries_.end(), 
00170                                                                          _FT(path) ))
00171                         {
00172             }
00173                         
00174                         void operator++ () 
00175             {
00176                                 current_ = std::find_if(current_+1, 
00177                                                                                 l_->entries_.end(), 
00178                                                                                 _FT(path_));
00179                         }
00180                         
00181                         bool operator!= (const basic_iterator& it) 
00182             {
00183                                 return it.current_ != this->current_;
00184                         }
00185                         
00186                         entry* operator->() 
00187             {
00188                                 return &*current_;
00189                         }
00190                         
00191                         const entry operator* () 
00192             {
00193                                 return *current_;
00194                         }
00195             
00196         private:
00197                         liverpool * l_;
00198                         std::string path_;
00199                         entry_vec::iterator current_;
00200                 };
00201                 
00202                 typedef basic_iterator<dir_filter> diterator;
00203                 typedef basic_iterator<file_filter> iterator;
00204                 
00205                 friend class basic_iterator<dir_filter>;
00206                 friend class basic_iterator<file_filter>;
00207                 
00208                 iterator begin(const std::string& path) 
00209         {
00210                         return iterator(this, const_cast<std::string&>(path));
00211                 }
00212                 
00213                 iterator end() 
00214         {
00215                         return iterator(this);
00216                 }
00217                 
00218                 diterator dir_begin(const std::string& path) 
00219         {
00220                         return diterator(this, const_cast<std::string&>(path));
00221                 }
00222                 
00223                 diterator dir_end() 
00224         {
00225                         return diterator(this);
00226                 }
00227                                 
00232                 ifdstream open_stream(const std::string& path) 
00233         {                       
00234                         // First we need to get the entry
00235                         iterator it = begin(path);
00236                         if(it != end()) 
00237             {                           
00238                                 entry e = *it;
00239                                 if( !e.is_dir() ) 
00240                 {                                       
00241                                         
00242                     return ifdstream(
00243                         fs_stream_.fd(), 
00244                             fs_stream_.offset() + e.offset(), 
00245                                 e.size() );
00246                                         
00247                                 } else {
00248                                         LOG("Given path is a directory. Can't open a stream to a directory.");
00249                                         throw std::exception();
00250                                 }
00251                                 
00252                         } else {
00253                                 LOG("Couldn't open file '%s' in lvp archieve.", path.c_str());
00254                                 throw std::exception();
00255                         }
00256                 }               
00257         };
